body_html:
Yes this is interesting indeed. I have had to create the sym link as well
as fix DYLD_PATH for tensor flow GPU to work.

On Tue, Nov 8, 2016 at 5:42 PM, Freddy Snijder notifications@github.com
wrote:

FYI, it works with ipython after the applying the hack in issue #2910
#2910 (ln -s
libcuda.dylib libcuda.1.dylib). How could this be?

—

body:
Yes this is interesting indeed. I have had to create the sym link as well
as fix DYLD_PATH for tensor flow GPU to work.

On Tue, Nov 8, 2016 at 5:42 PM, Freddy Snijder notifications@github.com
wrote:

> FYI, it works with ipython after the applying the hack in issue #2910
> https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2910 (ln -s
> libcuda.dylib libcuda.1.dylib). How could this be?
> 
> —
